mainText:
I went into engineering because of Steve Jobs.   He was a genius and I 
wanted so much to be just like him.  I learned later that the point of 
his genius was to think for yourself -- that was one of the best gifts 
anyone has ever given me.

I pray Steve is at peace.

Thank you Apple for your amazing products.   Please don't let Steve's 
memory fade.
author: Cate
